name: How to Bury a Dragon
description:
They say it takes a village to raise a child, but how many people does it take to bury a dragon?

A short Twine game about guilt, intrusive thoughts and putting to rest old stories. It was made specifically for the Twine Survival Guide Jam on a wing and prayer.

The cover image was created using VQGAN+CLIP by Katherine Crowson with the prompt "watercolour dragon sleeping angel."
